jobDescription: Location :Rocklin, CA  Duration : 1 year  HR Analyst is the master of people data. They hold the highest level of responsibility to ensure that employee records are accurately and efficiently compiled, reviewed, analyzed, submitted and secured in our proprietary Human Capital Management (HCM) system. Our analysts work as a team to manage HR workflows designed to support Oracles global workforce. We collaborate across regions and continents to ensure the timely processing of people data; to analyze problems that surface from data errors; generate reports to account for large data uploads and transfers; provide solutions to line management, HR business partners and employees to ensure their personal information and records are accurate and secure. The HR analyst is a critical asset in the flow of information necessary to recruit, hire and onboard new employees. We work together to ensure that employees data is updated when it changes as a result of organizational changes, job transfers, promotions and terminations.
